attributes.action: Stop NHS Tourist abuse. All visitors to UK must have recognised Health Insurance
attributes.additional_details:
Report reveals that the NHS is failing to claim back money from foreign overseas visitors who received free treatment, to which they had not been entitled.
The Telegraph
attributes.background: NHS Trusts collected just £255m of at least £500m spent providing treatment to foreign patients last year, according to a new report by the National Audit Office (NAO)
